# Equations

$$
x_i \sim N(\mu, \sigma)
$$ {#eq-norm}


$$
y_i \sim Pois(\lambda)
$$ {#eq-pois}

@eq-norm is a normal distribution.


@eq-pois is a Poisson distribution.


Eq. S[-@eq-norm] is a normal distribution.


Eq. S[-@eq-pois] is a Poisson distribution.
